remarks: Any multiple of an element is contained in the generated cyclic subgroup.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
cycsubg2cl.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubg2cl.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cycsubg2cl.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
cycsubg2cl $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N .x. A ) e. ( K ` { A } ) ) $.
